title: (x) Gerolsteiner logo - Gill Sans Extra Condensed Bold {Mark S, Stephen}
content:
Can anyone (Dan) tell me what font the Gerolsteiner type is in?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gerolsteinerjer.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052013/http:/typophile.com/files/gerolsteinerjer.jpg) | 125.15 KB |
author: Esteve

comments.content: It seems to be a variation of [Gill Sans Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052013/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/condensed/testdrive.html?s=GEROLSTEINER&p=48). I think maybe they added a stroke or something.

I think Mark's right. There is also a [Gill Sans Extra Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052013/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.7002.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=74&sampleText=GEROLSTEINER&sampleSize=96) that is only slightly different.

Perfect!

Thanks for the fast response.

S
